properties.headline: Blizzard Warning issued February 6 at 3:20PM AKST until February 8 at 5:00AM AKST by NWS Anchorage, AK
properties.description:
* WHAT...
Blizzard Warning: Blizzard conditions expected. Winds
gusting as high as 55 mph combined with snow will reduce
visibilities to less than one quarter mile.
Winter Weather Advisory: Blowing snow will continue. Winds
gusting 25 to 35 mph with snow will continue to bring
visibilities down to a half mile or less.

* WHERE...Pribilof Islands.

* WHEN...
Blizzard Warning: from 6 PM Friday to 5 AM AKST Saturday.
Winter Weather Advisory: until 9 PM AKST this evening.

* IMPACTS...Significantly reduced visibility will make for
dangerous travel conditions.
properties.instruction:
A Blizzard Warning means severe winter weather conditions are
expected or occurring. Falling and blowing snow with strong winds
and poor visibilities are likely. This will lead to whiteout
conditions, making travel very hazardous. If you must travel,
have a winter survival kit with you.

Slow down and use caution while traveling.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM AKST THIS EVENING... ...BLIZZARD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM FRIDAY TO 5 AM AKST SATURDAY
